title: Discovering aromatherapy
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/First aid in illness and injury
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Alternative medicine
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Oils and fats
description: An inspiring and easy to follow program which outlines the history of essential oils. Explores what aromatherapy is and examines the various ways it can be utilised to enhance quality of life. Includes information on sinusitus, hayfever, tension and stress, headaches, insomnia, PMT-pre-menstrual tension, burns, cuts, grazes, insect bites, travel sickness, arthritis and rheumatism, strains, sprains, childhood ailments, pets and beauty treatments. PLEASE NOTE THAT THE CONTENTS OF THIS VIDEO ARE FOR INFORMATION PURPOSES ONLY AND READ THE DISCLAIMER AT THE BEGINNING OF THE PROGRAM.
